class.name: button_box_state_controller/ButtonBoxStateController
class.description: Read button box info from hardware interface and publish it

class.description: Read joystick info from hardware interface and publish it

class.name: spacemouse_state_controller/SpacemouseStateController
class.description: Read spacemouse info from hardware interface and publish it

class.name: joint_mode_state_controller/JointModeStateController
class.description: Read joint_mode info from hardware interface and publish it

class.name: match_state_controller/MatchStateController
class.description: Read match info from hardware interface and publish it

class.name: state_listener_controller/MatchStateListenerController
class.description: Listens to frc_msgs::MatchData messages for joints marked as remote, writes their value to the local controller

class.name: pcm_state_controller/PCMStateController
class.description: Read PCM info from hardware interface and publish it

class.name: pdh_state_controller/PDHStateController
class.description: Read PDH info from hardware interface and publish it

class.name: pdh_controller/PDHStateController
class.description: Interface for setting PDH switchable channel, and for triggering clear faults and identify PDH actions

class.name: state_listener_controller/PDHStateListenerController
class.description: Listens to frc_msgs::PDHData messages for joints marked as remote, writes their value to the local controller

class.name: pdp_state_controller/PDPStateController
class.description: Read PDP info from hardware interface and publish it

class.name: state_listener_controller/PDPStateListenerController
class.description: Listens to frc_msgs::PDPData messages for joints marked as remote, writes their value to the local controller

class.name: ph_state_controller/PHStateController
class.description: Read PH info from hardware interface and publish it

class.name: robot_controller_state_controller/RobotControllerStateController
class.description: Read robot controller info from hardware interface and publish it
